item.title: [SUREFIRE-2036] Regression: 3.0.0-M5 fails with configured JUnit 5 provider
item.description:
SUREFIRE-2033 breaks the automatic configuration of the JUnit 5 provider when junit-platform-runner happens to be in the classpath, but additionally manual override of this misconfiguration is broken too and results in a NullPointerException.

Specifically, using https://github.com/apache/maven-surefire/pull/485:
